title: Riot Scammed Me
body:
Eric Matthews told me I could change my name so I went and bought the card. I told them in the very first post what I wanted the name changed to. They didn't tell me until after I bought the card that I couldn't change it to that. Now they refuse to do anything about and I am just another victim of Riot's shady business. 

I am putting in a complaint to the BBB. I recommend that no one ever buy anything from this company. I know I won't be spending any money on this game anymore. There is no telling how many people they scam each year. Guess they have to keep their shareholders happy by any means necessary.
